vote.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Marilyn Cravens et al. v. City of Dallas, Cause No. CC-19-06797-C - $245,000.00 for the settlement of the claims of Marilyn Cravens, Individually and as Independent Administratrix of the Estate of Kenrick Mistrot, Deceased, and Cole Mistrot, and $245,000.00 for the settlement of the claim of Richard Lee Andrews - Total not to exceed $490,000.00 - Financing:  Liability Reserve Fund
